definition.text: The Trend Direction Force Index (TDFI) originally by Pyotr Wojdyo for the metastock trading platform, uses the idea that there is enough trend directional force to enter a trade.

paragraphs.text: Trend Direction Force Index on the Charts

The indicator's output will show green values above the filter threshold for an upward trend direction, and red values below the filter threshold for a downward trend. Between the threshold values, the indicator's output will be grey.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| LWProxy | tdfi | value |
The parameters of the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "TDFI" Procedure Loop.
